message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your needs and interests. Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a price of $120 for it. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a reasonable premium compared to its market value of $100. I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or use. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.
